citations.narrative:
The entry gate into the female white-tailed deer enclosure has gaps between the gate and the fence posts. The
gaps are located on both sides of the gate and measure approximately 4-5 inches wide. The gaps are large enough
to potentially allow unauthorized animals into the enclosure.
Repair or replace this area of the enclosure.
To be corrected: 10-2-18
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
The entry gate into the female white-tailed deer enclosure has gaps between the gate and the fence posts.  The
gaps are located on both sides of the gate and measure approximately 4-5 inches wide.  The gaps are large enough
to potentially allow unauthorized animals into the enclosure.  
Repair or replace this area of the enclosure.
To be corrected: 10-2-18
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
